glsa.title: LimeWire: Disclosure of sensitive information
glsa.synopsis: Two vulnerabilities in LimeWire can be exploited to disclose sensitive information.

background.p: LimeWire is a Java peer-to-peer client compatible with the Gnutella file-sharing protocol.

description.p: Two input validation errors were found in the handling of Gnutella GET requests (CAN-2005-0788) and magnet requests (CAN-2005-0789).

impact.p: A remote attacker can craft a specific Gnutella GET request or use directory traversal on magnet requests to read arbitrary files on the system with the rights of the user running LimeWire.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
